name: forbidden
title: Forbidden
short: CSRF check failed.  Check your headers.

name: unauthorized
title: Unauthorized
short: You don't have permission to do that.  Try logging in.

name: not-found
title: Not Found
short: That endpoint was not found.  Check ids in the url.

name: bad-input
title: Bad Input
short: The posted resource is invalid.  Check the response for details.

name: conflict
title: Conflict
short: The posted resource already exists.  Check unique keys (e.g email).

name: bad-method
title: Method Not Allowed
short: That method is not defined at that endpoint.
